TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit TrackingAnnotationCollection extends System.Collections.Generic.List`1<string>

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Workflow.* types are deprecated. Instead, please use the new types from System.Activities.*")

remarks.format:
## Remarks
> [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]
Annotations are `strings` that you define that contain information to associate with certain kinds of tracking data. For more information, see <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityDataTrackingExtract.Annotations%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint.Annotations%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord.Annotations%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint.Annotations%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingRecord.Annotations%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowDataTrackingExtract.Annotations%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint.Annotations%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord.Annotations%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, or <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItem.Annotations%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingAnnotationCollection> is initialized to an empty list.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<string> annotations) cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class by using a list of string annotations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingAnnotationCollection> is initialized to contain the strings specified in `annotations`.

Docs.exception: is a null reference ( in Visual Basic)
